definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Da Yuan Dayitongzhi, Yuan dynasty geographical encyclopedia, compiled 1285-1294 under Jamal al-Din 紮馬剌丁|扎马剌丁 and Yu Yinglong 虞應龍|虞应龙, 755 scrolls
Da Yuan Dayitongzhi, Yuan dynasty geographical encyclopedia, compiled 1285-1294 under Jamal al-Din 紮馬剌丁|扎马剌丁 and Yu Yinglong 虞應龍|虞应龙, 755 scrolls
pinyin: Da4 Yuan2 Da4 yi1 tong3 zhi4

sentences.english: C. Discussion on Freshman English course for DFLL majors.
sentences.chinese: 有关检讨外文系大一英文课程案，提请讨論。

sentences.english: But most freshmen and sophomores will have to choose alternatives.
sentences.chinese: 但是大多数大一学生和大二学生得另选课程。

sentences.english: The victim, identified by his surname Lu, was a freshman in Sichuan Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 这位受害人姓卢，是四川师范大学的一名大一新生。

sentences.english: So as a freshman, I was only involved in one club, and I was taking classes.
sentences.chinese: 大一的时候，我只参加了一个俱乐部，还上课。

sentences.english: Last semester, a freshmen asked to borrow some reference books for exams.
sentences.chinese: 上学期，一位大一新生向她借一些考试用的参考书。

sentences.english: As a freshman, he found his campus lonely and alienating.
sentences.chinese: 大一的时候，沈新超发现自己的校园生活很孤单。

sentences.english: So you're also a freshman in the Department of Law?
sentences.chinese: 这么说你也是法律系的一个大一新生？

sentences.english: Freshmen tend to idealize their lives in college.
sentences.chinese: 大一新生往往把大学生活理想化了。

sentences.english: And their level of mental health take on degressive tendence.
sentences.chinese: 大一学生的心理健康状况有下降的趋势。

sentences.english: Freshmen are required to live on campus and they live on single-sex floors.
sentences.chinese: 大一新生必须住在校园里，而且男女生不会混层居住。

sentences.english: Conmen usually look for easy prey , such as freshmen.
sentences.chinese: 骗子通常找容易受骗的人下手，比如大一的新生。

sentences.english: In the freshman year , don't worry too much about your career plans.
sentences.chinese: 大一的时候不用太过担心未来的职业规划。

sentences.english: Yes, I have. Freshman year, I was having a lot of trouble in my Physics class, and
sentences.chinese: 是的。大一那年，我在物理课上遇到了很多难题，

sentences.english: We are currently helping underprivileged first year students ofFudan University.
sentences.chinese: 目前资助对象是复旦大学大一特困生。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
to pass brilliantly (used in congratulatory fashion)
senior high school/abbr. for 高級中學|高级中学[gao1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
